Articles.Content: When using the Reload All button from Database, it scrolls lots of messages in the database, many of which scroll off screen. Is there a way to have it preserve these messages or increase number kept?

Everything gets printed to the log listed in this post (location varies Win/Mac/Linux): [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29)
